info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 1:47AM EDT until August 24 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wayne County in southeastern Michigan... Southwestern Oakland County in southeastern Michigan... Southeastern Livingston County in southeastern Michigan... Northeastern Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 147 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Lyon, or near Novi, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Northville and Salem around 200 AM EDT. Dixboro around 215 AM EDT. Ypsilanti and Canton around 230 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Island Lake State Recreation Area, New Hudson, Lakeland, Plymouth, Wixom and Westland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
